data.name: Eng fail to resettle Tortuga
data.desc: Tortuga replanted under Capt. Nicholas Reskeimer as Governor, who thereafter dies
data.agents_nsp0: Capt Nicholas Reskeimer of Ship 'Expectation' 80 Eng men
data.note: there were then [late 1635] some 80 English in the settlement [Tortuga], besides 150 negroes /v Haring 62 /Add MS 13977
